page.title: 04OLD TREE FARM HOATH
page.content:
This farm is run by Mr John Gibson and his son Alan.They do all the work themselves with some help from their wives and Richard (son of Alan).They work between 9 and 11 hours a day. The farm has 90 acres of land including 50 acres of corn 28 acres of grass and 8 acres of green vegetables.
There are 600 free range hens and Mr Gibson also raises cattle for beef. He buys about 20 calves a year from the market as well as having the calves born on the farm.He keeps a herd of 60.The store cattle are sold at Ashford or Canterbury market and the fat cattle to a butcher.
